subject: RE: [junit] Re: how to avoid multiple initialization ?
msgSnippet: ... I was just in a teaching mood when I asked that. :) J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s write software that people understand.
messageBody:

>I suppose that would cause problems. I could add a tearDown method to
>set doSetup back to true, which would work as long as the tests aren't
>running overlapped. The URL Mike Clark posted is obviously a better
>solution since it would avoid these problems.

I was just in a teaching mood when I asked that. :)
